content: bring a warm winter glow to your festive décor with the twinkling trees stocking a beautifully elegant overlay mosaic crochet pattern worked in one seamless piece from toe to cuff this cosy worsted-weight project is perfect if you ve ever searched for a fun holiday crochet pattern with a traditional feel or simply love seasonal makes that look far more complicated than they are this listing includes two different stocking options detailed written instructions how-to charts plus a supporting video tutorial showing you how to crochet a traditional stocking using the overlay mosaic technique whether you re new to mosaic crochet or already hooked this pattern is a fun festive way to learn create and celebrate the season in style a great crochet project for adventurous beginners and beyond that allows the mosaic crochet detail to shine through crocheted using us single_crochet and double_crochet stitches *please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english not
